question: Which of the following accorded title of Mirza Raj Sawai on Jai Singh of Ambar?
explanation: The Mughal emperor Jahandar Shah abolished the jizya. He accorded title of Mirza Raj Sawai on Jai Singh of Ambar and also gave the title of Maharaja to Ajit Singh. Jahandar Shah ruled from c.1712â€“1713 CE.
